name: Detective late hour's
description:
Initial report:

████-year-old white male found dead in the ballroom of the Omni Kurtis House luxury hotel.

The in memoriam of the wealthy businessman Eduard Van Cutsem was beeing celebrated.

 ██ █████ ███████ ███████ ████ █ ████ ████ ██████ ██ ████ 

The attendees assure that he did not speak to anyone during the in memoriam, however he did give a speech.

 ██ █████ ███████ ███████ ████ █ ████ ████ ██████ ██ ████ .

He drank a glass of champagne and fell to the ground.

He did not eat or drink anything else during the evening.

 ██ █████ ███████ ███████ ████ █ ████ ████ ██████ ██ ████
